head.supplied: ¶ [...] ¶ ¶ Re the supplementary volume to the Fl Australiensis when I consented to prepare the manuscript. It was to be ready within two years from its commencement now three years have elapsed and...

div.p: From Frederick Bailey to Georg Luehmann
Letter press copy book 3, p. 701, Queensland Herbarium, Brisbane.

Re the supplementary volume to the Fl Australiensis when I consented to prepare the manuscript. It was to be ready within two years from its commencement now three years have elapsed and from your letter little progress has been made by the late Baron Mueller. I naturally thought that it was ready for the printer or at least nearly so. And it appeared to me that now I was the proper person to complete the work. So addressed a letter upon the subject to your Chief Secretary to which so far no answer has been returned. I have only done what I consider my duty and there the matter may rest.
